status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary:
Across this 6‑hour window the turbine is predominantly in **Downtime** (37 ten‑minute intervals), with generation effectively flat near rated when present (power_mean **0.974** with very low variability **0.0044**). Wind conditions are generally steady (mean **15.9 m/s**, std **1.16**) but include an extreme peak (**44.3 m/s**, tagged **high_wind**).

Operationally, rotor speed shows no variability (rotor_rpm_std **0.0**) while generator speed varies modestly (std **0.67**), alongside average pitch around **10.53°** and notable mean yaw misalignment (**9.58°**). A consistent negative power residual (mean **-0.1226**, tagged **power_deficit**) indicates measured power trending below the reference expectation during the window; average temperature is **68.6**.
